ModMetaData.name: Tribal Signal Fire (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
Update of Cryusakis mod for RimWorld 1.1 https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1556062693
[img]https://i.imgur.com/GYswkZ7.png[/img]
Support-chat: https://discord.gg/SuhwVpM
Non-steam version: https://github.com/emipa606/TribalSignalFire
--- Original Description --- Tribal colonies were never able to communicate with other factions in the game, so this mod will allow you to do just that.
The SignalFire is built, looks and requires to be refuled just like the campfire but pawns can interact with it as though it is a comms console. You cannot communicate with orbital trade ships, just ground factions.
Originally made by Cryusaki.
